awards.title: Frontiers Planet Prize - nomination
awards.summary: The Frontiers Planet Prize celebrates breakthroughs in sustainability science, rewarding solutions that show measurable potential to help humanity remain within the boundaries of the Earthâ€™s ecosystem. My paper was forwarded by McGill University to the National Nominating Body for Canada (National Research Council of Canada)

awards.title: Harry Smith Prize
awards.summary: The Harry Smith Prize recognizes the best paper published by an early career researcher in Molecular Ecology
